snippet: With President Obama scheduled to visit Colombia this weekend, the A.F.L.-C.I.O.'s president says that Mr. Obama should not certify that Colombia has done enough to stop the killings of union leaders and supporters there.
abstract: With President Obama scheduled to visit Colombia this weekend, the A.F.L.-C.I.O.'s president says that Mr. Obama should not certify that Colombia has done enough to stop the killings of union leaders and supporters there.

headline.main: A.F.L.-C.I.O. Chief Sends Obama Letter Voicing Concern About Labor Killings in Colombia
